author: cvuosalo
body:
`CondTools/Geometry/test/GeometryTester.cc ` needed to be migrated to use ES tokens and `esConsumes`, as requested by issue #36043.

#### PR validation:

The Geometry Tester was run before and after the revision, and its output stayed the same.

No backport is needed.
title: esConsumes migration of CondTools/Geometry/test/GeometryTester.cc
